mockData.title: Import Sample Data
mockData.description: Start exploring Eryxon MES with realistic metal fabrication shop data
mockData.explanation: We'll create sample jobs, parts, and operations that represent a typical sheet metal fabrication workflow.
mockData.cellsDescription: Laser cutting, bending, welding, assembly, finishing, and QC
mockData.jobsDescription: Real-world examples from different customers with priorities
mockData.partsDescription: Various metal components including enclosures, brackets, and panels
mockData.operationsDescription: Complete workflow from cutting through quality control
mockData.success: Sample data has been imported successfully!
mockData.note: You can clear this sample data later from the admin settings, or reimport it anytime to reset your test environment.

welcome.title: Welcome to Eryxon MES! ðŸ‘‹
welcome.description: This is your Admin Dashboard for managing your metal fabrication shop. Let's take a quick tour of the key features.

sidebar.title: Navigation Sidebar
sidebar.description: Access all admin functions from here: Dashboard, Jobs, Parts, Issues, Assignments, and Configuration.

stats.title: Real-time Metrics
stats.description: Monitor active jobs, parts in progress, ongoing operations, and reported issues at a glance.

operations.title: Active Operations
operations.description: See what operators are currently working on in real-time. Track progress by cell/stage.

jobs.title: Jobs Management
jobs.description: Create and manage customer jobs. Each job contains parts that flow through your manufacturing cells.

config.title: Configuration
config.description: Set up your shop: add operators, define manufacturing cells/stages, configure API integrations, and customize workflows.

complete.title: You're All Set! ðŸŽ‰
complete.description: Eryxon MES organizes work by manufacturing stages (cutting, bending, welding, etc.) using Quick Response Manufacturing (QRM) principles.
complete.description2: Operators pull work when ready, and you get real-time visibility into the shop floor without walking around.
complete.cta: Explore the sample data or start creating your own jobs!

welcome.title: Welcome to Eryxon MES! ðŸ‘‹
welcome.description: This is your Work Queue - your mobile-first interface for tracking manufacturing tasks. Let's show you around!

queue.title: Your Work Queue
queue.description: All operations assigned to you appear here, organized by manufacturing stage (cutting, bending, welding, etc.).

card.title: Operation Cards
card.description: Each card shows the part, operation details, and status. Tap a card to see drawings, STEP files, and custom instructions.

timer.title: Time Tracking
timer.description: Tap Start when you begin work and Stop when done. Simple, visual, and accurate time tracking.

nav.title: Bottom Navigation
nav.description: Quickly switch between your Work Queue, My Activity (time entries), and Issues you've reported.

complete.title: Ready to Work! ðŸ”§
complete.description: Eryxon shows you what to work on, grouped by materials and stages - organized the way your shop runs.
complete.description2: Visual indicators (colors, images) make tasks instantly recognizable. Everything you need, nothing extra.
complete.cta: Start by selecting an operation from your queue!

tour.completed: Tour completed! You can restart it anytime from settings.
tour.resetSuccess: Tour reset! Refresh the page to start the tour again.
